summary: This is my first "mod" in essence it's just a Ancient Nord Greatsword I modified to fit a story I'm doing using my characters in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first "mod" in essence it's just a Ancient Nord Greatsword I modified to fit a story I'm doing using my characters in Skyrim.

The short and the long of it is this: It's permanently enchanted with Elemental Fury so it attacks faster, it has 999 damage and sells for around 10k, a lot of you will look at it as complain about it being too powerful. Oh well, this was started at my first whim.

You can find the Warblade in the first room of Bleakfalls Barrow on top of the chest next to the fire. Why there? Because I'm just starting out. Feel free to leave a review of this weapon...And if you find others of it floating around in the world. Oops, again I'm just starting out I have no clue what I'm doing.
___________________________________________________________________________________________

The story behind the weapon:

This weapon was passed down through the Blacksun Clan, it has been reforged again and again as time wore on and it was used by the chieftains of each generation. It was lost to the clan and wound up in a barrow on another continent.

((If you choose to play the game as one of the surviving Blacksuns just to fulfill the story behind it of reclaiming it and rebuilding the clan, by all means do.))
author: Stormcrow3002
